Java Class Library API

This is the API documentation for version 1.0.882 of the dellroad-stuff Java library.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
org.dellroad.stuff
Top level package for the dellroad-stuff Java library.
org.dellroad.stuff.dao
Data Access Object (DAO) support classes.
org.dellroad.stuff.graph
Graph-related classes.
org.dellroad.stuff.io
I/O-related classes.
org.dellroad.stuff.java
General Java-related utility classes.
org.dellroad.stuff.jibx
JiBX-related classes.
org.dellroad.stuff.main
Classes supporting "main" classes, i.e., classes with a public static void main method that are intended to be invoked from the command line.
org.dellroad.stuff.net
Networking-related classes.
org.dellroad.stuff.pobj
Simple XML Persistence Objects (POBJ).
org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.distrib
Classes that facilitate synchronizing a PersistentObject database across multiple nodes.
org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.vaadin
Classes that facilitate connecting Vaadin to PersistentObjects.
org.dellroad.stuff.schema
Classes supporting automated database schema management.
org.dellroad.stuff.servlet
Servlet-related utility classes.
org.dellroad.stuff.spring
Spring related classes.
org.dellroad.stuff.sql
Classes related to SQL operations.
org.dellroad.stuff.string
Utility classes relating to parsing and formatting strings.
org.dellroad.stuff.util
Utility classes relating to collections, etc.
org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin
Vaadin-related classes, especially relating to Spring integration.
org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin7
Vaadin-related classes, especially relating to Spring integration.
org.dellroad.stuff.validation
Classes related to JSR-303 validation.
org.dellroad.stuff.xml
XML utility classes.

This is the API documentation for version 1.0.882 of the dellroad-stuff Java library.

Visit the dellroad-stuff homepage at http://dellroad-stuff.googlecode.com/.
